# Data Preparation

Classification of forest cover is based on satellite images from the USGS Landsat Archive, that were available for different dates in the period 1985 = 2019. The cartography of forest carbon further used data from the National Forest Inventory 2015/16, SRTM elevation data and Worldclim v2 climatic data. 

## Extent, CRS and Resolution

The coordinate system used is WGS 84 / UTM zone 31N (EPSG: 32631). The extent considered covers the whole country Togo, including a boundary of 5 km (xmin=`r TGO.ext@xmin`, xmax=`r TGO.ext@xmax`, ymin=`r TGO.ext@ymin`, ymax=`r TGO.ext@ymax`), with a resolution of 30 x 30 meter. All data was projected to this reference extent and coordinate system.

## Data Sources

### Landsat Imagery

Landsat imagery was downloaded from the [USGS Earthexplorer](https://earthexplorer.usgs.gov/). Images considered were those towards the end of the dry season (between December and February/March) with low cloud cover taken. Images from December were assigned to the following year.
